content.text:
# 2024 President's Cup

Dimitar Kuzmanov
| champmd =  Egor Agafonov /  Ilia Simakin
| champws =  Tatiana Prozorova
| champwd =  Anastasia Gasanova /  Ekaterina Shalimova
}}
The '''2024 President's Cup''' was a professional tennis tournament played on outdoor hard courts. It was the 19th edition of the men's tournament which was part of the 2024 ATP Challenger Tour, and the 15th edition of the women's tournament which was part of the 2024 ITF Women's World Tennis Tour. It took place in Astana, Kazakhstan between 15 and 21 July 2024.
Champions
Men's singles
*  Dimitar Kuzmanov def.  Saba Purtseladze 6–4, 6–3.
Men's doubles
*  Egor Agafonov /  Ilia Simakin def.  Denis Istomin /  Evgeny Karlovskiy 6–4, 6–3.
Women's singles
*  Tatiana Prozorova def.  Alexandra Shubladze, 7–5, 6–7(5–7), 6–1
Women's doubles
*  Anastasia Gasanova /  Ekaterina Shalimova def.  Vitalia Diatchenko /  Zhanel Rustemova, 7–6(7–4), 2–6, [10–7]

Other entrants

*  Aleksandre Bakshi
*  Grigoriy Lomakin
*  Amir Omarkhanov
The following players received entry from the qualifying draw:
*  Petr Bar Biryukov
*  Antoine Ghibaudo
*  Saveliy Ivanov
*  Seita Watanabe
*  Takeru Yuzuki
*  Maxim Zhukov
